column2: this is one of the best and important things Chicago has over many other American cities. This museam rivals those of the Louve and the Uffizi to name a few and has probably the largest amount of well known or art used in pop culture. Other than the Mona Lisa
column3: this place has all of those pieces of art that you are familiar with and those which you should know. Also
column5: that can be considered a steal compared to what they charge at other places and its free during certain times. It is a real treat to visit these great works of art at least once or twice a year.
